fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface ExpressionFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockFactoryImpl

    public interface ExpressionFactory
    Factory to create Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for common expressions in programming languages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Expression createArrayAccess(Expression _array, Expression _index)
      Create a node for an access to an element in an array expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
      Assignable createArrayAssignment(Assignable _array, Expression _index)
      Create a node for an assignment to an element in an array expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
      Expression createBinaryExpression(Expression _left, BinaryOperator _operator, Expression _right)
      Create a node for a binary expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
      Value createBooleanValue(boolean _value)
      Create a node for a boolean value expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
      Value createIntegerValue(java.lang.String _texte)
      Create a node for an integer value expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
      Expression createUnaryExpression(UnaryOperator _operator, Expression _parameter)
      Create a node for an unary expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
      Assignable createVariableAssignment(VariableDeclaration _declaration)
      Create a node for a variable assignment in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
      Expression createVariableUse(VariableDeclaration _declaration)
      Create a node for a variable use expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

    • Method Detail

      • createBinaryExpression

        Expression createBinaryExpression(Expression _left,
                                  BinaryOperator _operator,
                                  Expression _right)
        Create a node for a binary expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _left - Abstract Syntax Tree for the left parameter of the binary operation.
        _operator - Enum value for the binary operator.
        _right - Abstract Syntax Tree for the right parameter of the binary operation.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the binary operation.

      • createUnaryExpression

        Expression createUnaryExpression(UnaryOperator _operator,
                                 Expression _parameter)
        Create a node for an unary expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _operator - Enum value for the unary operator.
        _parameter - Abstract Syntax Tree for the parameter of the unary operation.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the unary operation.

      • createIntegerValue

        Value createIntegerValue(java.lang.String _texte)
        Create a node for an integer value expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _texte - Textual representation of the value of the Abstract Syntax Tree IntegerValue node.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the integer constant.

      • createBooleanValue

        Value createBooleanValue(boolean _value)
        Create a node for a boolean value expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _value - Boolean value for the Abstract Syntax Tree BooleanValue node.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the boolean constant.

      • createVariableUse

        Expression createVariableUse(VariableDeclaration _declaration)
        Create a node for a variable use expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree. with resolving the reference with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _declaration - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the declaration of the variable.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access to a variable.

      • createVariableAssignment

        Assignable createVariableAssignment(VariableDeclaration _declaration)
        Create a node for a variable assignment in the Abstract Syntax Tree. with resolving the reference with the Symbol Table.
        Parameters:
        _declaration - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the declaration of the variable.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access to a variable.

      • createArrayAccess

        Expression createArrayAccess(Expression _array,
                             Expression _index)
        Create a node for an access to an element in an array expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _array - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the array.
        _index - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the index in the array.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _index cell in the _array.

      • createArrayAssignment

        Assignable createArrayAssignment(Assignable _array,
                                 Expression _index)
        Create a node for an assignment to an element in an array expression in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _array - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the array.
        _index - Abstract Syntax Tree node for the index in the array.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access of the _index cell in the _array.
